root.title: Godolphin Horne,
root.descrip: Who was cursed with the Sin of Pride, and Became a Boot-Black.

picture.interp: A man stands next to his shadow.

lg.l: He held the Human Race in Scorn,
And lived with all his Sisters where
His father lived, in Berkeley Square.
And oh! the Lad was Deathly Proud!
He never shook your Hand or Bowed,

picture.interp: A poor man shows respect to a wealthier man.

lg.l: Should flourish in a Child of Six!
Just then, the Court required a Page,

picture.interp: Distinguished man stands with scepter.

lg.l: (The Kindest and the Best of Men),

picture.interp: A man walks with a book.

lg.l: And murmured, as he scanned the list
(To see that no one should be missed),

picture.interp: A man sleeping in bed.

lg.l: William Coutts has got the Flue,

picture.interp: A man stands widely.

lg.l: And Billy Higgs would never do,
And Guy de Vere is far too young,

picture.interp: A girl with a toy horse.

lg.l: I think I know the kind of thing,

picture.interp: A man being hung.

root.lg:
let us say Godolphin Horne?”
But hardly had he said the word
When Murmurs of Dissent were heard.
The King of Iceland’s Eldest Son
Said, “Thank you! I am taking none!”
The Aged Duchess of Athlone
Remarked, in her sub-acid tone,
“I doubt if He is what we need!”
With which the Bishops all agreed;
And even Lady Mary Flood
(So Kind, and oh! so really good)
Said, “No! He wouldn’t do at all,
He’d make us feel a lot too small,”
The Chamberlain said,

lg.l: No doubt you’re right.... One cannot tell!”
He took his Gold and Diamond Pen

picture.interp: A man signing papers.

lg.l: So now Godolphin is the Boy
Who blacks the Boots at the Savoy.

picture.interp: A shoe-shiner standing next to his shining box.
